entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0131.9729] The concept FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrentStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleList has been reported with a value of set(LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsCurrent). The value of this element is recorded as 672,000 in the financial statements. This value is less than the value recorded for FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent with a value of 844,000. It is expected that the value of FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent should be less than the value of the Financial statement line item as it comprises this total. Element : us-gaap:FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent Period : 2023-12-31 Dimensions :
Rule Element Id:9729 Rule version: 26.0.9 - cwt-20241231.htm 8
